languages.text: {n}Девушка сгребает карты, тревожно поглядывая на вас.{/n} "Это все, что я вижу, Домин. Но это не значит, что нет чего-то еще. Меня тревожат знамения грядущего. Но изменить судьбу мы не в силах. Остается лишь... ждать. И готовиться к неизбежному".

{n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка сгребает карты, тревожно поглядывая на вас.{/n} "Это все, что я вижу, Домин. Но это не значит, что нет чего-то еще. Меня тревожат знамения грядущего. Но изменить судьбу мы не в силах. Остается лишь... ждать. И готовиться к неизбежному".

traits.locale_text: {n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "That is all I can see, Enim. But that doesn't mean I saw everything. These omens of the future are unsettling. Still, we are powerless to change our destiny. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

{n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "That is all I can see, Enim. But that doesn't mean I saw everything. These omens of the future are unsettling. Still, we are powerless to change our destiny. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

{n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Enim. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

{n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Enim. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

{n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

{n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

languages.text: {n}Recoge las cartas y te mira de soslayo con cierta inquietud.{/n} «Le he dicho todo lo que he podido, Domin. Pero puede que haya más en su destino de lo que alcanzo a ver. Estos presagios son alarmantes, pero el sino es ineludible. Lo único que podemos hacer es... esperar. Y prepararnos para lo inevitable».
languages.original_text: {n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Recoge las cartas y te mira de soslayo con cierta inquietud.{/n} «Le he dicho todo lo que he podido, Domin. Pero puede que haya más en su destino de lo que alcanzo a ver. Estos presagios son alarmantes, pero el sino es ineludible. Lo único que podemos hacer es... esperar. Y prepararnos para lo inevitable».

languages.text: {n}彼女はカードを回収し、あなたに不安げな視線を向ける。{/n}「ドミン、私に伝えられることはすべて伝えた。けれど、私に見える者以上のことがあるかもしれない。この前兆は不穏なものではあるけれど、運命を変えることはできない。私たちにできるのは…待つことだけ。そして、必然に備えること」
languages.original_text: {n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女はカードを回収し、あなたに不安げな視線を向ける。{/n}「ドミン、私に伝えられることはすべて伝えた。けれど、私に見える者以上のことがあるかもしれない。この前兆は不穏なものではあるけれど、運命を変えることはできない。私たちにできるのは…待つことだけ。そして、必然に備えること」

languages.text: {n}她将塔罗牌收好，不安地看了你一眼。{/n}“我已经把能告诉你的事情全都告诉你了，秘者，但这一切可能比我想象得更加复杂。我看到的预兆令我感到不安，但我们无法改变自己的命运。我们只能……等待，为不可避免的未来做好准备。”
languages.original_text: {n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}她将塔罗牌收好，不安地看了你一眼。{/n}“我已经把能告诉你的事情全都告诉你了，秘者，但这一切可能比我想象得更加复杂。我看到的预兆令我感到不安，但我们无法改变自己的命运。我们只能……等待，为不可避免的未来做好准备。”

languages.text: {n}Sie sammelt die Karten ein und sieht dich beunruhigt an.{/n} "Ich habe Euch alles gesagt, was ich kann, Domin. Aber es kann hiermit mehr auf sich haben, als ich sehen kann. Diese Omen sind verstörend, aber wir können unser Schicksal nicht ändern. Wir können nur ... warten. Und uns auf das Unvermeidbare vorbereiten."
languages.original_text: {n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie sammelt die Karten ein und sieht dich beunruhigt an.{/n} "Ich habe Euch alles gesagt, was ich kann, Domin. Aber es kann hiermit mehr auf sich haben, als ich sehen kann. Diese Omen sind verstörend, aber wir können unser Schicksal nicht ändern. Wir können nur ... warten. Und uns auf das Unvermeidbare vorbereiten."

languages.text: {n}Elle ramasse les cartes et vous adresse un regard embarrassé.{/n} « Je vous ai dit tout ce que je savais, Domin, mais certaines choses échappent peut-être à mon regard. Ces présages sont troublants, mais on ne va pas à l'encontre du destin. Tout ce que nous pouvons faire... c'est attendre. Attendre, et nous préparer à l'inéluctable. »
languages.original_text: {n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

Ces présages sont troublants, mais on ne va pas à l'encontre du destin. Tout ce que nous pouvons faire... c'est attendre. Attendre, et nous préparer à l'inéluctable. »

languages.original_text: {n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."

languages.text: {n}Kartları toplayıp tedirginlik içinde sana göz ucuyla bakıyor.{/n} "Sana anlatabileceğimi anlattım Domin. Ancak benim görebildiğimden ötesi de olabilir. Bu alametler tedirgin edici olsa da insan kaderini değiştiremez. Elimizden gelen tek şey... Beklemek. Bir de kaçınılmaza hazırlanmak."
languages.original_text: {n}She collects the cards and glances at you uneasily.{/n} "I have told you everything I can, Domin. But there may be more to this than I can see. These omens are unsettling, but we cannot alter our fate. All we can do is... wait. And prepare for the inevitable."
